content.raw: Thanks for this! I [reran the DSL job](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/_dsl_ariac/341/console) after f9a869d and then manually triggered the `ariac-debbuilder` in [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ariac-debbuilder/110/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ariac-debbuilder/110/) . It looks like it created an `ariac3` package in the [prerelease repo](http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-prerelease/dists/bionic/main/binary-amd64/Packages), and that package appears to work :tada:  . If I understand correctly to make releases I just need to [update the changelog](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/ariac3-release/src/default/bionic/debian/changelog) and manually trigger the `ariac-debbuilder` job instead of running `release.py`. Is that correct?
content.html: Thanks for this! I reran the DSL job after f9a869d and then manually triggered the ariac-debbuilder in https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ariac-debbuilder/110/ . It looks like it created an ariac3 package in the prerelease repo, and that package appears to work . If I understand correctly to make releases I just need to update the changelog and manually trigger the ariac-debbuilder job instead of running release.py. Is that correct?
